sentences.en: A furry dog from her burning building was rescued by a woman.
sentences.cn: 一条毛茸茸的狗被以位妇女从燃烧的楼里救了出来.

sentences.en: Four furry friends frolicking feverishly for fun.
sentences.cn: 四只毛茸茸快乐嬉戏的的朋友,真好玩.

sentences.en: Furry and feathery animals are a common trigger of asthma symptoms.
sentences.cn: 动物的毛发(包括羽毛)是一种常见的哮喘过敏原.

sentences.en: Furry animals grow long coats in winter.
sentences.cn: 长毛皮的动物在冬天长出长长的皮毛.

sentences.en: I struck the cup down in a sudden fit of furry.
sentences.cn: 我一时慌促,把杯子打翻了.

sentences.en: In the martial furry men became insensible to wounds.
sentences.cn: 斗争的怒火会使人不感觉到创伤的痛楚.

sentences.en: It's a small furry animal which you often keep as a pet.
sentences.cn: 毛茸茸的小动物,你经常把它当作宠物.

sentences.en: Knut takes a well - earned rest with his furry friends.
sentences.cn: 克纳特和它的毛绒伙伴们舒服地休息着.

sentences.en: Many pet owners treat their furry friends part of the family.
sentences.cn: 很多宠物的主人把这些毛茸茸的朋友当作家庭的成员.

sentences.en: Most people opt for the furry friendliness of the cat family.
sentences.cn: 大部分人选择毛茸茸而友善的猫科动物.

sentences.en: Small head, YuanLiuLiu eyes needful, plus furry body, especially provoking love.
sentences.cn: 小脑袋, 圆溜溜的眼睛转个不停, 再加上毛茸茸的身体, 特别惹人喜欢.

sentences.en: The moss was soft and furry to the touch.
sentences.cn: 苔藓柔软，摸起来像绒毛。

sentences.en: This furry material will make a warm coat for the winter.
sentences.cn: 这件毛皮料在冬天会是一件保暖的大衣.

sentences.en: This is a hangover from Joe's furry ancestors.
sentences.cn: 这是从乔的有毛的的祖先那里遗留下来的.

sentences.en: What softness and furry thickness of the tall pines about the shore!
sentences.cn: 两岸挺拔的松树多么柔和,多么浓密!

words.tran_cn: 毛皮制的；穿毛皮的；长着软毛的
用毛皮覆盖；使穿毛皮服装（fur的过去分词）
用毛皮衬；使生苔（fur的ing形式）
用毛皮覆盖；使穿毛皮服装

trans.tran_cn: 毛皮的，毛皮制的，有皮毛般覆盖的，有舌苔的，<美俚>可怕的，毛骨悚然的
trans.tran_en: covered with fur or short threads
